name: Social media logos ⭐️ Variants
description:
• 25 social media logos
  • 3 styles: Original shape, rectangle and rounded rectangle
  • Combined as variants
  • Optically aligned
  • Includes black and white versions


If you want to request a logo to be added drop a comment. Thanks!


The legal stuff

Each platform has some sort of conditions for using their logo. You should look these up in case you use them for anything other than links.


Changelog

v1.3.1 - Mar 5

  • ADDED - Figma


v1.3.0 - Mar 1

  • CHANGED - There used to be a single component and each platform was a variant; now, each platform has it's own component so it shows up nicely in the assets panel.
  • ADDED - Microsoft, Messenger
  • ADDED - A version property. It would be nice to keep track of logo changes over time.


v1.2.5 - Nov 11

  • ADDED - Meta Platforms


v1.2.4 - Jul 20

  • ADDED - Apple


v1.2.3 - Jul 7

  • ADDED - Cover
  • ADDED - Behance, Snapchat, SoundCloud
  • CHANGED - Logos that are black and white by design are considered 'Colored'
  • CHANGED - Adjusted sizes for Facebook, Twitter, Google, Spotify, Telegram, WhatsApp to be better aligned


v1.2.2 - Jun 14

  • ADDED - GitHub, CodePen


v1.2.1 - Jun 11

  • CHANGED - LinkedIn logo, monochrome version, contained within its square to be more distinguishable when displayed next to other social media logos


v1.2.0 - Apr 15

  • ADDED - TikTok, Pinterest, Reddit and Vimeo


v1.1.0 - Jan 7

  • CHANGED - Medium logo updated to ellipsis version
  • FIXED - Spotify monochrome logo to be transparent


v1.0.0 - Jan 1, 2021
